actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to prevent unwarranted invasions of privacy by prescribing procedures and standards governing the disclosure of certain financial information by financial institutions to Federal agencies.

summary.text: Right to Financial Privacy Act - Prohibits any financial institution from disclosing to a Federal agency any financial record of a customer unless such customer has so authorized or a valid warrant, subpena or summons has been obtained according to the terms of this Act. Provides civil and criminal penalties for violations of this Act, in addition to injunctive relief.

titles.title: A bill to prevent unwarranted invasions of privacy by prescribing procedures and standards governing the disclosure of certain financial information by financial institutions to Federal agencies.
